channel.title: admin on SpEcEvGen
channel.description: Recent content in admin on SpEcEvGen

item.description: I have been doing research in the field of Population Genetics since 2006. I am interested in the distribution of genetic variation (both neutral and adaptive) in natural environments, at different spatial and temporal scales (from Landscape Genetics to Phylogeography). To understand pattern and process, I use empirical data as well as spatial eco-evolutionary modeling. I am currently a Ph.D. candidate in the Department of Biology at the University of Mississippi.
